other_title: Detektiv Conan: Die 15 Minuten der Stille (German)
المحقق كونان: ربع ساعة من الصمت (Arabic)
名偵探柯南 沈默的15分鐘 (Chinese (Taiwan))
名探偵コナン 沈黙の15分（クォーター） (Japanese)
plot: An explosion in a subway tunnel brought Conan and co. to investigate Kitanosawa where they met a group of friends who used to live in the village nearby before it was relocated. A boy who has been in coma, a car accident and the explosion itself swirl around the mystery in Kitanosawa.
